icpLegends.Small Quant: Small quant funds, indie quants, and researchers prototyping in notebooks.
icpLegends.Technical Founders: Founders who code and use notebooks to explore product, markets, or trading ideas.
icpLegends.DS at Small Startup: Solo or small-team data scientists supporting product/growth in Series A–C-ish companies.
icpLegends.DBT Models ↔ Jupyter: People living between dbt models and Jupyter (analytics engineers, DS/ML who use dbt).
icpLegends.Academic / Lab: Grad students, lab RAs, and PIs working in Python notebooks.
icpLegends.Scientific: Researchers with spatial, environmental, or scientific panel data.
icpLegends.Paper-Runners: People running “paper-ready” analyses: economists, policy analysts, RAs, think-tank folks.
icpLegends.Product ML: ML engineers/DS building models for product features (ranking, prediction, personalization).

replays.name: Build an SPX Options IV Surface

replays.name: Crypto Rolling Correlations & Heatmaps

replays.name: Event-to-RSVP Funnel Drop-off (Amplitude + Internal DB)

replays.description: Extend a real PM2.5 forecasting notebook with new features, model runs, and plots ready for a paper or stakeholder report.
